name: io.github.alisaitteke/npm-mcp
description: Discover, compare, and analyze npm packages with AI-generated recommendations. NOT just metadata - this MCP actively compares packages, generates pros/cons analysis, scores alternatives, and provides 'which is better?' recommendations. Perfect for: 'what packages exist?', 'which is better: X or Y?', 'what are pros/cons?', 'when to use A vs B?' questions. Combines npm registry data with intelligent analysis.
